âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Generates searchable PDF/A files â€¢ Accurately places OCR text below the image â€¢ Optimizes PDF images for smaller file sizes â€¢ Deskews and cleans images before OCR â€¢ Uses Tesseract OCR engine for 100+ languages
ðŸ“– Summary: OCRmyPDF adds a searchable text layer to scanned PDFs, making them searchable and copyable. It optimizes images, deskews when needed, and uses Tesseract OCR to support many languages. The tool produces PDF/A compliant files and distributes processing across multiple CPU cores.
